name: Sample Card LI
rules: This is a card with both an explicit id and layout. The layout and id will both be respected (if possible).
flavor: Just in case you want to be totally explicit.

name: Sample Card XI
rules: This is a card with an explicit id but a blank layout. The id will be respected, but the default layout will be used.
flavor: We understand that sometimes you just want one layout.

name: Sample Card LX
rules: This is a card with an explicit layout but a blank id. The layout will be respected (if possible), but an id will be automatically assigned based on the file name and card index.
flavor: You can have control over the layout while letting the system assign reasonable ids.

name: Sample Card XX
rules: This is a card with a blank layout and id. The default layout will be used, and an id will be automatically assigned based on the file name and card index.
